items.sentence: Tom and Mary finished their meal and then went into the living room to watch TV.
Like most eighteen-year-olds, Tom isn\'t sure what he wants to do with his life.
I\'m trying to figure out how you managed to do that without anyone finding out.
Tom wanted to ask Mary how old she was, but he thought that maybe he shouldn\'t.
The doctor said he was more concerned about Tom\'s ankle than his broken finger.
Tom admitted that he didn\'t eat the cake that his girlfriend had baked for him.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom didn\'t know Mary was going to be in Boston this week.
I don\'t think that I could stand being in the same room with Tom all afternoon.
In the 1960\'s, Japanese college students demonstrated against their government.
She got the money from him even though he said that he wouldn\'t give it to her.
